name: The 8th International Conference on Education and Psychology
content: The International Conference on Education and Psychology (ICEAP 2024) is scheduled to be held from July 18 - July 20, 2024 in Fukuoka, Japan. ICEAP aims to provide a communication platform for scholars, professionals, academics and graduate students not only to present their recent and latest researches but also to share their thoughts and to discuss the future development in the field of Education, Psychology and more sub-fields. Sustainable development has been a common concern of all walks of life for more than a decade. According to the United Nations Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs), there are 17 goals (Goals) and 169 sub-targets (Targets), which cover environmental, economic, and social aspects.In this meeting, we will open a special session related to education and psychology.
